review: Promising and low cost, but it isn't ready yet. Constant crashing and limited apps make it not ready to oust my chromecast yet.
author: Michael Delaney

review: The stick doesn't hav a good enough receiver to log into our wifi in the bedroom where we wanted to use it. Our kindle fires, iPhones and laptops have no trouble getting signal in that same room. Stuck can find our wifi, but not connect to it.  They may send a replacement. If that works I will update the review but given how extensive their suggestions are for improving reception, I'm not too hopeful.
